myosotis.death.item.falls: If I could be like a chicken...

myosotis.advancements.death.root.title: Brave untold danger
myosotis.advancements.death.root.descrip: Why can you return again and again? Because this world itself is an immortal will, and you are it's beating heart
myosotis.advancements.adventure.kill_by_: Kill by zombie it's not a rare thing, just counterattack using your sword!
myosotis.advancements.adventure.explosio: The gunpowder could make the TNT, this is true art!
myosotis.advancements.adventure.kill_by_: The bones could make the wolf be your friend, its dog now
Really big spider in Minecraft, that awesome!
myosotis.advancements.adventure.death_by: The sky is the limit... right?
Then you helped Newton verify his laws
